name: web3-dapp-monorepo
description: Web3 DApp with Next.js frontend and Foundry smart contracts

scripts.build: npm run build -w @web3-dapp/shared && npm run build -w @web3-dapp/config && npm run build -w nextn
scripts.forge:build: npm run build -w contracts --silent --prefix contracts || npm --workspace contracts run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w frontend && npm run clean -w contracts
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules contracts/node_modules frontend/.next contracts/out contracts/cache
scripts.test: npm run test -w frontend && npm run test -w contracts
scripts.build:all: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w config && npm run forge:build && npm run build
scripts.deploy:local: npm run anvil & npm run forge:deploy
